com.altimit_server

Class Rooms

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.altimit_server.Rooms

  • class Rooms
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for manipulation of room map data on hazelcast

    • Method Detail

      • JoinRoom

        public static void JoinRoom(java.lang.String roomName,
                            int maxUsers,
                            java.util.UUID clientUUID)
        Joins a user to a room or creates one if the room deosnt exist.
        Parameters:
        roomName - The name of the room to be created or joined.
        maxUsers - The maximum amount of users that can be within the room.
        clientUUID - The UUID of the client attempting to join a room.

      • LeaveRoom

        static void LeaveRoom(java.util.UUID clientUUID)
        Remove a user from a room and delete rooms when no one exists. If the owner leaves a room then a new owenr is assigned to the room.
        Parameters:
        clientUUID - The client UUID of the user that will leave the room.

      • SendUserCount

        private static void SendUserCount(java.lang.String roomName)
        Sends the user count to each player when someone leaves or
        Parameters:
        roomName - Name of the room.

      • GetRoomUsers

        static java.util.HashMap<java.util.UUID,User> GetRoomUsers(java.lang.String roomName)
        Gets a list of users in a room.
        Parameters:
        roomName - Name of the room.
        Returns:
        List of users in the specified room.

      • RoomCount

        static int RoomCount()
        Gets the number of rooms on the Hazelcast room map.
        Returns:
        Number of rooms.
